text: Jay Dee Bentley (born June 6, 1964 in Wichita, Kansas) is the bassist and co- founding member of the punk rock band Bad Religion. He has played with the band through its whole existence with a small break between 1982 and 1986. He continues to perform and record with Bad Religion today. title: Jay Bentley
